articles.title: Pakistan vs Sri Lanka Live Score, Asia Cup 2023: Rain Delays Toss Of Pakistan vs Sri Lanka Match; Cut-Off Time Announced - NDTV Sports
articles.description: PAK vs SL Live, Asia Cup Super 4: Both Pakistan and Sri Lanka have two points and the winner of the virtual knock-out game will progress to the final on September 17
articles.content: PAK vs SL Live, Asia Cup Super 4: An injury-hit Pakistan will have the tough task of taming a high-spirited Sri Lanka in a Super 4 match in Colombo on Thursday for a place in the Asia Cup final. Toss… [+389 chars]

articles.author: Anurag Dasgupta
articles.title: Rain has Arrived in Colombo; PAK-SL Asia Cup Match in Threat - OneCricket
articles.description: With just an hour left for the all-important toss, rain god has arrived in Colombo and it is pelting down at the moment. The pitch has been covered and the fans can expect a delayed start to the game.
articles.content:
Rain has arrived in Colombo [Twitter]
Weather in Colombo, Sri Lanka continues to play spoilsport in the ongoing Asia Cup 2023. The two matches - India vs Pakistan and India vs Sri Lanka were marred … [+1051 chars]
